title: Introduction to Knowledge Managemnet portal
content: Welcome to Common Ground. This wiki is managed by the Knowledge Management team. This page is intended to give you an overview of the latest news .

title: description of ApplicationA
content: ApplicationA is a web-based application for managing internal processes.

title: architecture of ApplicationA
content: Microservices architecture with a front-end built in React and a backend using Node.js

content.description: ApplicationB is a data analytics platform.
content.architecture: Monolithic architecture with a Python-based backend and a Vue.js front-end.
